com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class FlowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.FlowLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class FlowLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    FlowLayout is a LayoutManager that allows components to be added to a WPanel in an arrangement that allows for vertical or horizontal flows irrespective of the content type of the added component. For horizontal flows the components may be arranged so that they are aligned to the left, center or right of the containing WPanel and so their content is arranged relative to each other at the top, middle or bottom of the containing WPanel or so their baselines align.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Mark Reeves
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FlowLayout.Alignment
      This is used to control the alignment of the components relative to the containing WPanel.
      static class  FlowLayout.ContentAlignment
      This is used to control the relative vertical alignment of the content in each cell.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FlowLayout.Alignment CENTER
      This value indicates that the components are placed in a row and centered relative to the containing WPanel.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment LEFT
      This value indicates that the components are placed in a row and left-aligned relative to the containing WPanel.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment RIGHT
      This value indicates that the components are placed in a row and right-aligned relative to the containing WPanel.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment VERTICAL
      This value indicates that each component should be placed on a new row.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlowLayout()
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with a centered alignment.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment)
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment (no horizontal or vertical gap) and content alignment.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int gap)

      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, Size space)
      Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, Size space, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout and alignment of content in the cells.

        public FlowLayout()
        Constructs a new FlowLayout with a centered alignment.

        Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
          FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
        Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment (no horizontal or vertical gap) and content alignment.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components
        contentAlignment - the alignment of the content in each cell

      • FlowLayout

        @Deprecated
public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                     int hgap,
                     int vgap)
        Deprecated. use FlowLayout(Alignment, Size)
        Creates a new flow layout manager with the indicated alignment and horizontal and vertical gaps. The horizontal gap is only used if alignment is not VERTICAl, the vertical gap is used only if alignment is VERTICAL.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components
        hgap - The horizontal gap between the cells. Not used if alignment is VERTICAL.
        vgap - The vertical gap between the cells. Used only if alignment is VERTICAL.

      • FlowLayout

        @Deprecated
public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                     int gap)
        Deprecated. use FlowLayout(Alignment, Size)
        Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout. The gap is applied as a vertical gap if the alignment is VERTICAL otherwise it is applied as a horizontal gap.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the required alignment
        gap - the required gap between components in the layout

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
          Size space)
        Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout. The gap is applied as a vertical gap if the alignment is VERTICAL otherwise it is applied as a horizontal gap.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the required alignment
        space - the required space between components in the layout

      • FlowLayout

        @Deprecated
public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                     int hgap,
                     int vgap,
                     FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
        Deprecated. use FlowLayout(Alignment, Size, ContentAlignment)
        Creates a new flow layout manager with the indicated alignment, horizontal and vertical gaps and content alignment. The horizontal gap is only used if alignment is not VERTICAl, the vertical gap is used only if alignment is VERTICAL, content alignment is only relevant if alignment is not VERTICAL.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components
        hgap - The horizontal gap between the cells. Not used if alignment is VERTICAL.
        vgap - The vertical gap between the cells. Used only if alignment is VERTICAL.
        contentAlignment - The relative vertical alignment of the content in each cell. Not used if alignment is VERTICAL.

      • FlowLayout

        @Deprecated
public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                     int gap,
                     FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
        Deprecated. use FlowLayout(Alignment, Size, ContentAlignment)
        Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout and alignment of content in the cells. The gap is applied as a vertical gap if the alignment is VERTICAL otherwise it is applied as a horizontal gap. The content alignment is applied only if alignment is not VERTICAL.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the required alignment
        gap - the required gap between components in the layout
        contentAlignment - the alignment of the content in each cell when alignment is not vertical

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
          Size space,
          FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
        Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout and alignment of content in the cells. The gap is applied as a vertical gap if the alignment is VERTICAL otherwise it is applied as a horizontal gap. The content alignment is applied only if alignment is not VERTICAL.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the required alignment
        space - the required space between components in the layout
        contentAlignment - the alignment of the content in each cell when alignment is not vertical
